results.title: Successful pharmacological management of a child with compound heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia and review of the recent literature.
results.text_hl: He was diagnosed with @DISEASE_Severe_Acute_Respiratory_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D045169 @@@SFH@@@, initially treated with @CHEMICAL_Cholestyramine_Resin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002792 @@@colestyramine@@@ that was subsequently combined with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. At the age of 12 years, he was diagnosed to have @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Stenosis_Supravalvular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D021921 @@@supravalvular aortic stenosis@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Ezetimibe @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069438 @@@ezetimibe@@@/@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ was introduced in place of @CHEMICAL_Cholestyramine_Resin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002792 @@@colestyramine@@@/@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Sreedharan AV, Pek SLT, Tan TH, Tavintharan S, Yap F. Successful pharmacological management of a child with compound heterozygous familial hypercholesterolemia and review of the recent literature. J Clin Lipidol. 2020 Sep-Oct;14(5):639-645. PMID: 32800790
